004/**
005 * {@include.toc}
006 * <h2>Compatibility layer for JVM SDK</h2>
007 *
008 * <p>The module <code>commercetools-sdk-compat-v1</code> allows the usage of the SDK in conjunction with the JVM SDK (v1)</p>
009 *
010 * <h3>Creating a SphereClient with the v2 SDK</h3>
011 *
012 * <p>The {@link com.commercetools.compat.CompatSphereClient} acts as a replacement {@link io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereClient} for applications using the JVM SDK (v1).</p>
013 *
014 * {@include.example com.commercetools.compat.CompatSphereClientUsageTest}
015 *
016 * <h3>Using Requests from the JVM SDK (v1)</h3>
017 *
018 * <p>The {@link com.commercetools.compat.CompatClient} can be used to execute a {@link io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest}
019 * with an {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpClient}</p>
020 *
021 * {@include.example com.commercetools.compat.CompatClientUsageTest}
022 *
023 */
